alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Meriwether, Pike, Upson, northeastern Talbot and southwestern Lamar Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hannahs Mill, or over Thomaston, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Zebulon, Woodbury, Molena, Meansville, Gay, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Concord, Atwater, Hilltop, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Logtown, Sunnyside, Hannahs Mill, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Lifsey Springs, Redbone Crossroads and Crest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
